item.title: My First Post
item.author: contact@serghei.pl (Serghei Iakovlev)
item.description: This is a post about latex. An equation: $$\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx$$ . inline example: $\sum_{i = 0}^N 2i = y$ One overbrace: $${a}^{b} - \overbrace{c}^{d}$$ Two overbraces: $$\underbrace{a}_{b} - \underbrace{c}_{d}$$ None of these below works properly: $$ \begin{aligned} equation &= 16 \\ other &= 26 + 13 \end{aligned} $$ $$ \begin{pmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{pmatrix} $$
